====Timeline of Trump and 2012 Politics====
====Timeline of Trump and 2012 Politics====
â
* Oct 3, 2010 - Trump appears on CNN to discuss a poll among New Hampshire voters.[http://thepage.time.com/2010/10/03/trump-card/]
+
* Oct 3, 2010 - Trump appears on CNN to discuss a poll among New Hampshire voters.<ref>Time[http://thepage.time.com/2010/10/03/trump-card/]</ref>
* Feb 10, 2011 - Trump appears at Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC)
* Feb 10, 2011 - Trump appears at Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC)
â
* Feb 15 - PPP poll finds Trump with 56% of Republican voters have unfavorable opinion of Trump, roughly tied with Ron Paul.[http://www.publicpolicypolling.com/pdf/PPP_Release_US_0215.pdf]
+
* Feb 15 - PPP poll finds Trump with 56% of Republican voters have unfavorable opinion of Trump, roughly tied with Ron Paul.<ref>Public Policy Polling - 15 Feb 2011[http://www.publicpolicypolling.com/pdf/PPP_Release_US_0215.pdf]</ref>
* March - A Wall Street Journal/NBC News poll released in March 2011 found Donald Trump leading the contest for GOP nomination by 1%.
* March - A Wall Street Journal/NBC News poll released in March 2011 found Donald Trump leading the contest for GOP nomination by 1%.
* April - a Public Policy Polling survey showed Trump leading GOP race by a full 9%.
* April - a Public Policy Polling survey showed Trump leading GOP race by a full 9%.
  +
* April 24 - White House releases long form birth certificate; Trump holds press conference.
* Apr 28 - Public Policy Polling survey conducted from Apr 21-24 shows Trump at second place among Republicans.
* Apr 28 - Public Policy Polling survey conducted from Apr 21-24 shows Trump at second place among Republicans.
â
* May 10 -Public Policy Polling survey showed Trump tied for fifth place among Republicans [http://www.publicpolicypolling.com/pdf/PPP_Release_US_0510925.pdf]
+
* May 10 -Public Policy Polling survey showed Trump tied for fifth place among Republicans<ref>PPP Poll 10-May-2011[http://www.publicpolicypolling.com/pdf/PPP_Release_US_0510925.pdf]</ref>
* May 14 - Trump appears on Fox News, becoming the 2nd person to report Mike Huckabee will not run.
* May 14 - Trump appears on Fox News, becoming the 2nd person to report Mike Huckabee will not run.
* May 16 - Trump announces he will not run.
* May 16 - Trump announces he will not run.
